        public boolean connect(int baudRate)
        Connect TapPosPrinterController with specific baud rate
        Parameters:
        baudRate - The baudRate to connect TapPosPrinter, normally 115200 or 230400 according the TapPosPrinter firmware.

      • initPrinter

        public TapPosPrinterController.PrintStatus initPrinter()

      • initPrinter

        public TapPosPrinterController.PrintStatus initPrinter(int batteryPercentage,
                                                       java.lang.Boolean isCharing,
                                                       int dotMode,
                                                       int darkness)
        Start the printing process.

        The Controller will request the receipt data by triggering onPrintDataRequested when it is ready to print. When the printing is completed, the callbacks onPrinterStatus will be triggered. Please refer to https://spectratech.atlassian.net/browse/PTPP-116 for settings

        Parameters:
        batteryPercentage - - Current battery capacity percentage.
        isCharing - - Is the device being charged by a power source
        dotMode - 0 - full dot mode, 1 - half dot mode.
        darkness - 0 - 2 three steps
        Returns:
        Print Status

      • sendPrinterData

        public void sendPrinterData(byte[] data)
        Send print data to Controller.

        Callback:
        TapPosPrinterController.PrinterDelegate.onPrinterStatus(TapPosPrinterController.PrintStatus)

        Parameters:
        data - A byte array of the print data.
